com.ereinecke.cvtprop

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ereinecke.cvtprop.Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads and parses property files (export xml format)

    Input is an export xml file from the WordPress theme WP Pro Real Estate Writes out export xml file in the format required by Realty v 3.0.1

    Since:
    1/21/2018
